title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3248/84 of 21 November 1984 fixing the prices to be used for calculating the value of agricultural products in intervention storage to be carried forward to the 1985 financial year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3248/84
of 21 November 1984
fixing the prices to be used for calculating the value of agricultural products in intervention storage to be carried forward to the 1985 financial year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The prices to be used for calculating the value of agricultural products in intervention storage to be carried forward to the 1985 financial year are set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
